section.section:
The Secretary shall appoint:
1 engineer member from the Department; and
2 public members who represent the community at large.

text.section: Before taking office, each appointee to the Board shall take the oath required by Article I, § 9 of the Maryland Constitution.

section.section: The term of a member appointed by the Governor is 4 years.
At the end of a term, a member appointed by the Governor continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed by the Governor after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.

text.section: The members appointed by the Secretary serve at the pleasure of the Secretary.
The Governor may remove for incompetence or misconduct a member appointed by the Governor.
